_comment_docs: Please read the docs for more detailed instructions on how to construct a repository. https://betterdiscord.net/docs
name: Example Theme
_comment_type: type should be either theme or plugin
_comment_filename: (optional)Set if your theme/plugin filename is different than the name. .theme.css and .plugin.js are automatically added.
_comment_tags: an array of tags to be displayed on your theme and used for searching
_comment_authors: an array of users who worked on the theme/plugin.(discord_username is displayed on the website with a link to their profile)

authors._comment_discord_username: fallback username if user profile is not found on the website database by discord_id
authors._comment_display_github: if true then github_username is displayed on the website instead with a link to their github(default = false)

_comment_preview: paths for previews, currently only used for a thumbnail. Full preview will load your whole css

preview._comment_thumbnail: Basepath for your thumbnail is the root directory of your repository
